title: ICE with inline_const and TypeId

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: F-inline_const
labels.description: Inline constants (aka: const blocks, const expressions, anonymous constants)

body: ### Code ```Rust #![feature(inline_const, const_type_id)] use std::alloc::Layout; use std::any::TypeId; use std::mem::transmute; use std::ptr::drop_in_place; pub struct VTable { layout: Layout, type_id: TypeId, drop_in_place: unsafe fn(*mut ()), } impl VTable { pub fn new() -> &'static Self { const { &VTable { layout: Layout::new::(), type_id: TypeId::of::(), drop_in_place: unsafe { transmute::(drop_in_place::) }, } } } } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.66.0-nightly (432abd86f 2022-09-20) binary: rustc commit-hash: 432abd86f231c908f6df3cdd779e83f35084be90 commit-date: 2022-09-20 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.66.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.0 ``` (latest nightly as of today) ### Error output ``` Compiling playground v0.0.1 (/playground) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 1 but the index is 1', compiler/rustc_middle/src/mir/mod.rs:424:22 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f00279f8d50 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h22157d54c25d05ad at /rustc/432abd86f231c908f6df3cdd779e83f35084be90/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 1: 0x7f00279f8d50 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::hf9a98b3986ed5962 at /rustc/432abd86f231c908f6df3cdd779e83f35084be90/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x7f00279f8d50 -
